dmca.title: [ABUSE] DMCA Complaint
dmca.body:
nc

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, February 23, 2005 11:34 AM
To: joseph@mxhub.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Complaint

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1




Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: joseph@mxhub.com <joseph@mxhub.com>
To: alfredvanz@bol.com.br
Date: Tuesday, February 22, 2005, 10:01:12 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] DMCA Complaint

===8<==============Original message text===============
Hello alfredvanz,

 We had receive a notice from our provider, theplanet , that your site
 had being copying materials from the official site cipsoft.com .
 Please reply to me and the other two personnel regarding this matter
 immediately. If we do not hear anything back from you within these 2
 days, your site will be terminated without prior notice.

- --
Best regards,
joseph
joseph@mxhub.com


===8<==============Original message text=============== February 16, 2005


Dear Sirs and Madams:

The internet address www.tibla.com/home is assigned to your address area.

Apart from the fact that this side offends against the copyright rules of
our official web side www.tibia.com, this reproduction of our web side is
used to obtain secret account data from our customers.

We ask you to remove the side www.tibla.com/home immediately from the
internet.

For further questions please feel free to contact me via email.

Yours sincerely,

Nicole Schneider
CipSoft GmbH




===8<===========End of original message text=========== -----BEGIN PGP


===8<===========End of original message text===========
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCHL6KvK/XpJs6oyURAmFdAJ0azMv2R/83Q2orDi//RykDWVRB5gCdFpPk
WLHv6O9CyzcUuiG4/I08quU=
=jopc
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
